content:
Hi :) After upgrading to the latest git, I get emails from update_analytics_counts mentioning:

System check identified some issues:

WARNINGS:
?: (staticfiles.W004) The directory 'static/' in the STATICFILES_DIRS setting does not exist.

What does this mean? Is that an issue or just some transition phase message?

It means someone didn’t read the Django documentation that says this is supposed to be a full path, when writing that code in 2013. It’s probably harmless (except in that emails are annoying), but I’ll look into it.
